channel.title: Comments on: Me Days Are Good Days, Too – Saturday, July 22, 2017

item.title: By: Karin Christian
item.dc:creator: Karin Christian
item.description:
Hi Cyndie, please tell your mom that I said hello. Your mom is a determined person and works so hard. She has made a lot of progress - so glad to hear that your mom is eating and working on the walking.
I think of Sue often and look forward to reading the updates!
Karin Christian
item.content:encoded:
Hi Cyndie, please tell your mom that I said hello. Your mom is a determined person and works so hard. She has made a lot of progress – so glad to hear that your mom is eating and working on the walking.

I think of Sue often and look forward to reading the updates!

Karin Christian
